description: "Sandy" (Hua Yushan) is a pop idol who ate some of "cupid`s chocolate" before becoming ill and falling into a coma. Although bed-ridden in a hospital, cupid`s chocolate gave her the ability to project a physical form of her consciousness, which she uses to make contact with http://anidb.net/ch79562 [Haoyi], whom she believes to be her childhood friend. Her goal is to take Haoyi with her into a fantasy world she `discovered` the entrance to shortly before seeking him out.
name: Sandy
